attributes.action: disclose all relevant information pertaining to the Hazel Blears Kit Kat expense claim
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We would like to know more about the circumstances surrounding the purchase.

Why did she pay such an infalted price for this chocalte snack?
What were her other expenses that day?
Had she missed dinner?
Was there a nearby store to purchase a Kit Kat at the RRP?

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament. http://www.parliament.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
